summary: No explicit requirements or acceptance criteria were provided in the BuildRequest. The only change in the diff is an update to project_state.json describing expanded home page categories; there are no corresponding frontend/backend implementation changes shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated project state metadata to claim expanded main page categories (Radio, DJs, IRL, Audio & Video Podcasts, PPV Events) without any requested requirements or implementation changes in the diff.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest lists no requirements/acceptance criteria, and the diff shows only a metadata/state file modification rather than actual feature implementation.
